nodes.text: Meeba was a Rodian female who was hired as a waitress at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. The cantina's owner, Oga Garra, caught her lover Dhoran with Meeba, and she ordered him off of the planet. After a disagreement, Garra shot and killed Dhoran outside of Meeba's apartment. When the waitress stepped outside, Garra fired her.
